append-avatar.description: Create a v-avatar component after the default contents of the append slot
append-avatar.description_zh: 在 append 插槽的默认内容后创建一个 v-avatar组件

append-icon.description: Create a v-icon component after the default contents of the append slot
append-icon.description_zh: 在 append 插槽的默认内容后创建一个 v-icon组件

border.description: Apply a border style to the component.

color.description: Specify the control color, which can be any Material color (e.g. success or purple) or Css color (e.g. #033 or rgba (255, 0, 0, 0.5)). You can find a list of built-in color classes in the Colors page.
color.description_zh: 指定控件颜色，颜色值可以是任意 Material 颜色（例如 success 或者 purple ）也可以是 Css 颜色 （例如 #033 或者 rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)）。在 颜色页中可以找到内置的颜色类列表。

density.description: Adjusts the vertical height used by the component.
density.description_zh: 调整组件使用的垂直高度。

disabled.description: Remove the ability to click or select a component to make it unavailable.
disabled.description_zh: 移除单击组件或选中组件的能力，将组件设置为不可用状态。

elevation.description: The elevation of the component is acceptable from 0 to 24. You can find more information on the elevation page.
elevation.description_zh: 组件的海拔可接受 0 到 24 之间的值。你可以在 elevation page浏览更多信息。

exact.description: Exact match link. Without this link, '/' will match each route. You can read more about Exactprop in the vue-router documentation.
exact.description_zh: 完全匹配链接。如果没有这个链接，‘/’ 将匹配每个路由。你能够在 vue-router 文档浏览更多 exactprop。

flat.description: Remove the shadow effect of the button.

height.description: Sets the height of the component.

hover.description: Applies 4dp of elevation when hovered (default 2dp). You can find more information on the elevation page
hover.description_zh: 悬停时应用 4dp 的高度（默认为 2dp）。您可以在高程页面上找到更多信息

href.description: Specify the component as an anchor and apply the href attribute.
href.description_zh: 指定组件为锚点并应用 href 属性。

image.description: Apply a specific background image to the component.
image.description_zh: 将特定背景图像应用于组件。

link.description: Designates that the component is a link. This is automatic when using the href or to prop.
link.description_zh: 指定组件是链接。当使用 href 或 to prop 时，这是自动的。

loading.description: A linear progress bar is displayed. This can be a string specifying which color is applied to the progress bar (any material color - primary, secondary, success, info, warning, error), or it can be a primary color using the component's boolean color (set by the color property if it is supported by the component).
loading.description_zh: 显示线性进度条。可以是指定将哪种颜色应用于进度条的字符串（任何 material 色彩——主要（primary）, 次要（secondary）, 成功（success）, 信息（info），警告（warning），错误（error）），或者使用组件的布尔值 color（由色彩属性设置——如果它被组件支持的话）还可以是原色。

location.description: Specifies the location of the component. You can apply multiple strings at the same time using space-separated strings.
location.description_zh: 指定组件的位置。可以使用空格分隔的字符串同时应用多个。

max-height.description: Sets the maximum height of the component.

max-width.description: Sets the maximum width of the component.

min-height.description: Sets the minimum height of the component.

min-width.description: Sets the minimum width of the component.

prepend-avatar.description: Create a v-avatar component before the default content of the prepend slot
prepend-avatar.description_zh: 在 prepend 插槽的默认内容前创建一个 v-avatar组件

prepend-icon.description: Create a v-icon component before the default content of the prepend slot
prepend-icon.description_zh: 在 prepend 插槽的默认内容前创建一个 v-icon组件

replace.description: Setting the replace property will call router.replace() instead of router.push() on click, so navigation doesn't leave a history. You can explore more replaceprops in the vue-router documentation.
replace.description_zh: 设置 replace 属性会在点击时调用 router.replace() 而不是 router.push()，这样导航就不会留下历史记录。您可以在 vue-router 文档中浏览更多 replaceprop。

rounded.description: Applies the border-radius style to the specified component. You can get more information about this on the Corner Radius of Borders page
rounded.description_zh: 对指定的组件应用 border-radius 样式。您可以在 边框的圆角半径页面获取更多有关信息

subtitle.description: Specify a subtitle text for the component.
subtitle.description_zh: 指定组件的副标题文本。

tag.description: Specifies the custom tag to be used on the root element.
tag.description_zh: 指定在根元素上使用的自定义标签。

text.description: Sets the content text of the component.

theme.description: Specifies the theme of this component and all of its subcomponents
theme.description_zh: 指定此组件及其所有子组件的主题

title.description: Specify a title text for the component.

to.description: Indicates the target route of the link. You can read more about toprops in the vue-router documentation.
to.description_zh: 表示链接的目标路由。你可以在 vue-router 文档浏览更多 toprop。

variant.description: Applies the border-radius style to the specified component. You can get more information about this on the Corner Radius of Borders page
variant.description_zh: 对指定的组件应用 border-radius 样式。您可以在 边框的圆角半径页面获取更多有关信息

width.description: Sets the width of the component.
